WorkItem.Description:
When any selection is made in the help file the following is displayed as if the addresses are absolute rather than relative.
Â 
The address is not valid 
   
   Most likely causes:
There might be a typing error in the address. 
If you clicked on a link, it may be out of date. 
 
   What you can try: 
     Retype the address.  
 
     Go back to the previous page.
WorkItem.Summary: The Ciloci.Flee.chm Compiled help file displays "Navigation to the webpage was canceled"

Comments.Message:
Hmm...it works on my machine (except if you click on links for things in the .NET framework and not in Flee)....

Maybe it's a security issue, try the suggestions in this link: http://weblog.helpware.net/?p=36 to see if that solves it.
